name: Prompt Refiner
description:
Tool for refining user prompts to make them more effective for LLMs and AI Agents by classifying them into categories and adding specific instructions.

Use this tool as a first step in an AI/LLM task to improve the quality of user inputs and obtain better outputs.

Fork this tool and define customized categories and related instructions to fit your specific use cases.
author: @@official.shinkai

llm.description: Optional LLM to use, instead of default. Use LLM IDs as displayed in Shinkai (e.g., 'shinkai_free_trial', 'gpt_5_mini', 'gemini_2_5_pro').

showCategory.description: Whether to include the classified category in the output

prompt.description: The user prompt to classify and enhance

category.description: The classified category of the prompt, if requested

enhancedPrompt.description: The refined and enhanced version of the input prompt
